general.name: IT-Glue Automatic Documentation - Print Servers [WIN]
general.description:
Documents Print server setting and queues. Backups the driver into ITGlue. Warning: Some drivers are larger than the maximum file size in ITGlue. These will not be backed up.
Minimum Required OS: Windows Server 2012 R2+, PS 5.0+ Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/documenting-with-powershell-documenting-print-servers/
